snippet: The satellites, which orbit Earth to relay phone calls and broadcast television programs, will become legal for civilian export under legislation signed into law by President Obama.
abstract: Communications satellites, which orbit Earth to relay phone calls and broadcast television programs, will become legal for civilian export under legislation signed into law by Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: The satellites, which orbit Earth to relay phone calls and broadcast television programs, will become legal for civilian export under legislation signed into law by President Obama.

headline.seo: Communications Satellites, Banned as ‘Weapons,’ Now Legal for Export
headline.main: Communications Satellites Made Legal for Export
headline.print_headline: Communications Satellites Made Legal for Export
